Oct. 5, 2002 D West Wales BBA Contest (Third Section)
West Wales BBA Festival Contest (Third Section) 30 Own Choice Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-festival-contest-third-section
None
Ammanford, Carmarthenshire, Wales, UK Best instrumentsalist - percussion - Briton Ferry. Prizes - 1st £120, 2nd £80, 3rd £60. 7 bands competed.
July 20, 2010, 5:49 p.m. July 3, 2020, 9:42 p.m.
1 Briton Ferry Band Mike Faro
2 Newbridge Celynen Band Paul Holland
3 Abertillery & District Youth Gareth Ritter
4 Llanelli Band Robert Owen
